name: Patrick J. CONLON, Appellee, v. RETIREMENT BOARD OF ALLEGHENY COUNTY, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Patrick J. CONLON, Appellee, v. RETIREMENT BOARD OF ALLEGHENY COUNTY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Bruce D. Campbell, Campbell Durrant & Beatty, P.C., Pittsburgh, for Retirement Board.

casebody.head_matter:
737 A.2d 247
Patrick J. CONLON, Appellee, v. RETIREMENT BOARD OF ALLEGHENY COUNTY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1999.
Decided Oct. 4, 1999.
Bruce D. Campbell, Campbell Durrant & Beatty, P.C., Pittsburgh, for Retirement Board.
George W. Jacoby, Vicki L. Beatty, Pittsburgh, for Patirck J. Conlon.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
